snippet: The Army has not released a list of the victims of the shooting rampage at the base, pending notification of relatives, but the names have started to emerge.
abstract: Army has not released list of victims of Fort Hood shooting rampage, pending notification of relatives, but names have started to emerge, released by relatives and officials offering their condolences.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and STEVEN YACCINO

lead_paragraph: The Army has not released a list of the victims of the shooting rampage at the base, pending notification of relatives, but the names have started to emerge.

headline.main: Among Fort Hood Victims, a Sergeant Is Killed, and a Major Is Wounded
headline.print_headline: No Official Army List, but Victims’ Names Emerge

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
